pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Induced Smoothed Lasso // An implementation of the induced smoothing (IS) idea to lasso regularization models to allow estimation and inference on the model coefficients (currently hypothesis testing only). Linear, logistic, Poisson and gamma regressions with several link functions are implemented. The algorithm is described in the original paper; see doi:10.1177/0962280219842890 and discussed in a tutorial doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.16360.11521.
